SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT104
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Direct Debit and Request for Debit Transfer Message
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
The MT 104 is used to convey customer direct debit instructions and can be:
a) sent by a non-financial institution account owner, or a party authorised by the account owner, to a financial institution to request the direct debit of the debtor's account with the receiver or with another financial institution, and subsequently to credit the creditor's account maintained by the receiver or one of its branches.
b) sent by the creditor's bank, or another financial institution, to the debtor's bank, or another financial institution, on behalf of the creditor/instructing party to order the debit of the debtor's account and to collect payment from this account.
c) sent by a non-financial institution account owner, or a party authorised by the account owner, to a forwarding financial institution to request the direct debit of the debtor's account and subsequently to credit the creditor's account serviced by a financial institution in another country.
d) sent between two financial institutions on behalf of a creditor/instructing party to request the direct debit of the debtor's account in the Receiver's country and subsequently to credit the creditor's account maintained by the Receiver or one of its branches.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: AUTH
Code.Description: This message contains pre-authorised direct debit instructions to be processed according to the terms and conditions of the direct debit contract and/or mandate.

Code.Name: NAUT
Code.Description: This message contains non pre-authorised direct debit instructions.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Used for bilaterally agreed codes/information. The actual bilateral code/information will be specified in the second subfield.

Code.Name: RFDD
Code.Description: This message contains request for direct debit instructions.

Code.Name: RTND
Code.Description: A previously sent MT 104 is being returned, ie, rejected, reversed or revoked.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T08) :

Code.Name: BEN
Code.Description: All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.

Code.Name: OUR
Code.Description: All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.

Code.Name: SHA
Code.Description: Under the Direct Debit scenario, the following definition applies:Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the debtor. The Sender and the Receiver should be understood as the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 104.Under the Request for Direct Debit scenario, the following definition applies:All transaction charges other than the charges of the Receiver servicing the creditor's account are borne by the debtor. Receiver should be understood as Receiver of the MT 104 (RFDD).

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T47) .

Code.Name: AUTH
Code.Description: This occurrence of sequence B contains a pre-authorised direct debit instruction to be processed according to the terms and conditions of the direct debit contract and/or mandate.

Code.Name: NAUT
Code.Description: This occurrence of sequence B contains a non pre-authorised direct debit instruction.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Used for bilaterally agreed codes/information. The actual bilateral code/information will be specified in the second subfield.

Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .

One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T08) :

Code.Name: BEN
Code.Description: All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.

Code.Name: OUR
Code.Description: All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.

Code.Name: SHA
Code.Description: Under the Direct Debit scenario, the following definition applies:Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the debtor. The Sender and the Receiver should be understood as the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 104.Under the Request for Direct Debit scenario, the following definition applies:All transaction charges other than the charges of the Receiver servicing the creditor's account are borne by the debtor. Receiver should be understood as Receiver of the MT 104 (RFDD).

CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U08
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid syntax, format, code word in tag 119(Validation Flag). Allowed value is RFDD."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1-1 If field 23E is present in sequence A and contains RFDD then field 23E must be present in all occurrences of sequence B. If field 23E is not present in sequence A then field 23E must be present in all occurrences of sequence B (Error code(s): C75)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 23E is present in sequence A and contains RFDD then field 23E must be present in all occurrences of sequence B. If field 23E is not present in sequence A then field 23E must be present in all occurrences of sequence B"

fieldvalidation.name: C1-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C1-2 If field 23E is present in sequence A and does not contain RFDD then field 23E must not be present in any occurrence of sequence B (Error code(s): C75).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 23E is present in sequence A and does not contain RFDD then field 23E must not be present in any occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 Field 50a (option A or K), must be present in either sequence A (index 8) or in each occurrence of sequence B (index 21), but must never be present in both sequences, nor be absent from both sequences (Error code(s): C76).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 50a (option A or K), must be present in either sequence A (index 8) or in each occurrence of sequence B (index 21), but must never be present in both sequences, nor be absent from both sequences"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-1 When present in sequence A, field 26T must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 26T must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 26T must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 26T must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-2 When present in sequence A, field 77B must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 77B must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 77B must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 77B must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-3 When present in sequence A, field 71A must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 71A must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 71A must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 71A must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-4 When present in sequence A, field 52a must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 52a must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 52a must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 52a must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-5
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-5 When present in sequence A, field 21E must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, fields 21E must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 21E must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, fields 21E must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-6
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-6 When present in sequence A, field 50a (option C or L) must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 50a (option C or L) must not be present in sequence A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When present in sequence A, field 50a (option C or L) must, independently of each other, not be present in any occurrence of sequence B. When present in one or more occurrences of sequence B, field 50a (option C or L) must not be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-1 If field 21E is present in sequence A, then the second occurrence of field 50a (option A or K), must also be present in sequence A.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 21E is present in sequence A, then the second occurrence of field 50a (option A or K), must also be present in sequence A."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-2 In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 21E is present, then the second occurrence of field 50a (option A or K), must also be present in the same occurrence
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 21E is present, then the second occurrence of field 50a (option A or K), must also be present in the same occurrence"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 In sequence A, if field 23E is present and contains RTND then field 72 must be present, in all other cases - ie field 23E not present, or field 23E does not contain RTND - field 72 is not allowed (Error code(s): C82).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 23E is present and contains RTND then field 72 must be present, in all other cases - ie field 23E not present, or field 23E does not contain RTND - field 72 is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C6-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C6-1 If field 71F is present in one or more occurrence of sequence B, then it must also be present in Sequence C, and vice-versa (Error code(s): D79).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 71F is present in one or more occurrence of sequence B, then it must also be present in Sequence C, and vice-versa"

fieldvalidation.name: C6-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C6-2 If field 71G is present in one or more occurrence of sequence B, then it must also be present in sequence C, and vice-versa (Error code(s): D79).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 71G is present in one or more occurrence of sequence B, then it must also be present in sequence C, and vice-versa"

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present then the currency code or the amount, or both, must be different between fields 33B and 32B (Error code(s): D21).
fieldvalidation.formula: If(B.F33B.$size > 0, B.F32B[0].Currency != B.F33B[0].Currency || B.F32B[0].Amount != B.F33B[0].Amount, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present then the currency code or the amount, or both, must be different between fields 33B and 32B"

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 In any occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present and the currency codes in fields 32B and 33B are different, then field 36 must be present. Otherwise, field 36 must not be present (Error code(s): D75).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In any occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present and the currency codes in fields 32B and 33B are different, then field 36 must be present. Otherwise, field 36 must not be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 If sequence C is present and if the amount in field 32B of sequence C is equal to the sum of the amounts of the fields 32B of sequence B, then field 19 must not be present. Otherwise field 19 must be present (Error code(s): D80).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If sequence C is present and if the amount in field 32B of sequence C is equal to the sum of the amounts of the fields 32B of sequence B, then field 19 must not be present. Otherwise field 19 must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 If field 19 is present in sequence C then it must be equal to the sum of the amounts in all occurrences of field 32B in sequence B (Error code(s): C01).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 19 is present in sequence C then it must be equal to the sum of the amounts in all occurrences of field 32B in sequence B"

fieldvalidation.name: C11-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C11-1 The currency code in fields 32B and 71G in sequences B and C must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.formula: $firstCurrency = B[0].F32B[0].Currency; return B.F32B[0].Currency == $firstCurrency && (B.F71G.$size == 0 || B.F71G[0].Currency == $firstCurrency) && (C.$size == 0 || (C[0].F71G.$size == 0 && C[0].F32B[0].Currency == $firstCurrency) || (C[0].F32B[0].Currency == $firstCurrency && C[0].F71G[0].Currency == $firstCurrency));
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in fields 32B and 71G in sequences B and C must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message"

fieldvalidation.name: C11-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C11-2 The currency code in the charges fields 71F in sequences B and C must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in the charges fields 71F in sequences B and C must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message"

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: C12 In sequence A, if field 23E is present and contains RFDD, then: a)in sequence A field 21R is optional b)and in sequence B the fields 21E, 50a (option A or K), 52a, 71F,71G must not be present c)and sequence C must not be present.
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23E.$size > 0 && A[0].F23E[0].Type == "RFDD", B.F21E.$size == 0 && Implies(B.F50b.$size > 0, !In($value.F50b[0].FormatOption, 'A', 'K')) && B.F52a.$size == 0 && B.F71F.$size == 0 && B.F71G.$size == 0 && C.$size == 0, A[0].F21R.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 23E is present and contains RFDD, then: (a)in sequence A field 21R is optional (b)and in sequence B the fields 21E, 50a (option A or K), 52a, 71F,71G must not be present (c)and sequence C must not be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C13
fieldvalidation.comment: C13 If field 23E in sequence A is present and contains RFDD, then field 119 of User Header must be present and contain RFDD. If field 23E in sequence A is not present or does not contain RFDD, then field 119 of User Header must not be present
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 23E in sequence A is present and contains RFDD, then field 119 of User Header must be present and contain RFDD. If field 23E in sequence A is not present or does not contain RFDD, then field 119 of User Header must not be present"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-51A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-51A Field 51A is only valid in FileAct (Error code(s): D63).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 51A is only valid in FileAct."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-23E
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-23E The narrative second subfield can only be used in combination with OTHR (Error code(s): D81).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 23E of sequence A, Narrative may only be used in combination with 'OTHR'."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-23E The narrative second subfield can only be used in combination with OTHR (Error code(s): D81).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 23E of sequence B, Narrative may only be used in combination with 'OTHR'."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-B
fieldvalidation.comment: The first element in line 1 must contain either code /RETN/ or /REJT/
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first element in line 1 must contain either code /RETN/ or /REJT/"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-59a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-59a-A Although the presence of Account is optional in the field format, for the purpose of this message the Account of the debtor must be present (Error code(s): E10).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Although the presence of Account is optional in the field format, for the purpose of this message the Account of the debtor must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-71G-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FC-71G-A If field 71G is present in sequence C, the amount must not equal '0' (Error code(s): D57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 71G is present in sequence C, the amount must not equal 0"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-19
fieldvalidation.comment: F-19 The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the currency specified in field 32B (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the currency specified in field 32B."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-1
fieldvalidation.comment: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-2
fieldvalidation.comment: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-52a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-52a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-52a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-52a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-57a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-57a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-72-D
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the currency specified."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-E
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
